spells.title: Ropey
spells.description:
A sentient piece of rope. 50ft. 
As smart as a puppy. 
Obeys simple commands 
(coil, uncoil, tie a knot, crawl). 
Spend 1 Energy Point to give it a command.

spells.title: Immovable rod
spells.description:
Activating it makes it magically fixed in place. 
Until someone deactivates it, the rod doesn't move, even if it is defying gravity.

spells.title: Snarky Multitool
spells.description: A hammer possessed by a shapeshifting ghost. Can change itself into any small object or tool, if you can convince it to. Warning - it has a difficult personality.

spells.title: Imitator Goo
spells.description: Activate it, and it permanently turns into any mundane object it touches.

spells.title: Pedant's Pendant
spells.description: Gives you eidetic memory - perfect recollection of everything you have seen or experienced while wearing it(spend 3 EP to recall a memory).

spells.title: Holocrystal
spells.description: Records 3D holographic images and videos of the things in 10 meter radius around it (can also take regular photos/videos). Can send these recordings to other crystals.

spells.title: Mokeskin Pouch
spells.description: A small pouch that contains 4x4 meters of extradimensional space where you can store items, liquids, or even living creatures. Increases the number of items you can carry by 5. Any creature inside the pouch can exit it at will.

spells.title: Magic Tent
spells.description: Like in Harry Potter, from the inside it's a small comfy apartment.

spells.title: Refilling Flask
spells.description: Refills itself every midnight with whatever liquid was last in it. Works with potions.

spells.title: Alvion's Bracelet.
spells.description: With a twist of a ruby set in a bracelet, it allows an instant change of clothes, where ‘clothes' is fairly permissively defined and can include both weapons, armor, and things carried up to two hundred pounds, barring people. Can store up  to 3 outfits.

spells.title: Ring of Upward Bliss
spells.description: Tapping the ring three times teleports the user a mile up into the air.

spells.title: Clay Golem
spells.description: Slow and stupid servant, capable of obeying simple commands. Has 10 HP and can deal 4 damage.

spells.title: Meeseeks Box
spells.description: Press a button, name a simple task, it will create a helpful servant (up to 5 per day). The Meeseek lives until he accomplishes the simple task(up to an hour). If the task proves to be too difficult, he may turn on you out of frustration.

spells.title: Energy Crystal
spells.description: Stores up to 5 Energy Points. Spend energy points to charge it, increases your max energy by 5.

spells.title: Ultimate Lockpick
spells.description: When you insert it into any lock, it morphs into the key that fits.

spells.title: Magic sword
spells.description: Grows brighter when the enemies are nearby. Deals 5 damage.

spells.title: Staff of Druid
spells.description: Deals 4 damage. Strike earth, and a fountain of water will shoot up from that location for the next 10 minutes.

spells.title: Vambrace of Octopus
spells.description: Shoots out up to 8 thin, 10 meters long tentacles. Tentacles can grapple things and creatures, or deal 5 damage. Tentacles are strong enough to grasp a ledge of a building, and support your weight hanging on them.

spells.title: Needler
spells.description: A throwing dagger that returns back into your hand once it hits or misses the target. Stays hidden when the wielder is searched.

spells.title: Polysword
spells.description: Turns into any basic melee weapon.

spells.title: Flickerblade
spells.description: A sword with a blade that can blink in and out of existence with a thought. When the blade materializes, any material in its way is instantly removed from existence. Deals 4 damage.

spells.title: Sending Stones
spells.description: Magical walkie-talkie. Communicate telepathically within 300 meters of each other.

spells.title: Daily Cypress Pocket Edition
spells.description:
This pendant can be activated once per day, 
It reads you the most recent news headlines.

spells.title: Emerald bug
spells.description: Activate it, and for the next 5 days you will always know it’s location, and be able to hear what’s going on around it.

spells.title: Cloak of Disguise
spells.description: Creates an illusion around you, allowing you to assume the appearance

spells.title: Babelfish
spells.description: Put this tiny fish into your ear, and it'll translate any language you hear.

spells.title: Babellense
spells.description: Translate any text you see through it into the language you understand.

spells.title: Darkvision goggles
spells.description: See in the darkness as if it was daylight.

spells.title: Infrared goggles
spells.description: Add infrared vision that lets you see an outline of things that are generating heat nearby. Work through walls.

spells.title: Silver Fly
spells.description: Send it anywhere within 30 meters from you, see and hear through it's senses.

spells.title: Recording Gem
spells.description: Activate it, and it will record sounds/video around it for the next hour.

spells.title: Ring of Sending
spells.description: Send a telepathic 25-word message to anyone you have ever met.The recipient can send you a 25-word reply. Works twice per day.

spells.title: Marauder's Map
spells.description: Reveals the floor plan of the building you're in, with labeled moving dots of the creatures inside.

spells.title: Micro Time-Turner
spells.description: Activating this small hourglass sends you 1 minute back in time. Can be used up to 5 times per day.

spells.title: Invisibility Cloak
spells.description: Turns the wearer invisible.

spells.title: Helm of Illusion
spells.description: Place this helm onto a person's head, and it will create a virtual world of your design, indistinguishable from reality.

spells.title: Stopwatch of Timelessness
spells.description: Select up to 12 targets (people, creatures, objects). The time will pause for everything but them for up to 12 hours.

spells.title: Eye of Vance
spells.description: Sees everything in 360 degrees and 100m radius around you. Can see through solid objects. Can see invisible objects. Can see anything hidden. Works twice per day for 10 minutes

spells.title: Teleportation pyramids
spells.description: 2 small pyramids. Activating one pyramid teleports anyone who touches it to the location of the other pyramid.

spells.title: Teleportation Key
spells.description: Teleports you and up to 5 people who are touching it to any location you have ever personally visited. 1 hour cooldown.

spells.title: Dimensional Gate
spells.description: A pair of portals (large obsidian circles) connected by a wormhole.

spells.title: The ring of tiny-beast master
spells.description: Allows you to sense and control all the insects within 100 meter radius around you.

spells.title: Ring of Spell Storing
spells.description: Cast a spell on the ring to store it. Anyone who wears the ring can now cast this spell once. Stores up to 3 spells.

spells.title: Imperius Collar
spells.description: When it's put onto a person or a creature, you gain the ability to mind-control them. The person can break free when the collar is removed, or when it runs out of energy (touch the collar to charge it with Energy Points, 5 per day of use.) The person will obey your commands, but do their best to break free. You can take over their mind directly - see through their senses and control their body, but during that time you lose awareness of your own body and what's going on around you.

spells.title: Time Chamber
spells.description: Inside this room, the time moves 30 times faster. Spending a month in this room means only a day will pass outside.

spells.title: Backpack of Earthly Delights
spells.description: Backpack that allows the retrieval of mundane non-technical items from Earth with a thought, once per day. The item must fit within the backpack. Only items which actually exist on Earth can be requested. Game Master can always deny a request, in that case the backpack will contain the non-game-breaking item most similar to the request (if you ask for a bazooka you might get a stick of dynamite).

spells.title: Rememberball
spells.description: Activate it to "Save Game". You can return to the saved state for the next 10 minutes. To "load game" more than once, spend extra 2 EP.

spells.title: Death Note
spells.description: If you know the person's name and face, write their name in this black notebook, describing the time (within the next month) and manner of death (something that could realistically happen to them), and they will die in a described manner. Works once per day.

spells.title: Small Health Potion
spells.description: Restores 4 health.

spells.title: Small Energy Potion
spells.description: Restores 4 energy.

spells.title: Potion of Spider Climbing
spells.description: Climb walls/ceilings like spider man for 30 minutes.

spells.title: Potion of Underwater Breathing
spells.description: Lasts for 2 hours.

spells.title: Sleeping Potion
spells.description: The one who drinks it instantly falls asleep for 1 hour.

spells.title: Chloroform
spells.description: The one who inhales it instantly falls asleep for 1 hour.

spells.title: Poison
spells.description: The one who drinks it takes 15 damage.

spells.title: Magic Mushroom Potion
spells.description: Causes hallucinations

spells.title: Singing Potion
spells.description: For the next 30 minutes the drinker loses the ability to speak, able only to sing.

spells.title: Invisibility Potion
spells.description: Turns you invisible for 10 minutes

spells.title: Paralyzing Potion
spells.description: The one who drinks it is instantly paralyzed for the next day.

spells.title: Potion of Animal Friendship
spells.description: When you drink this potion, even the meanest non-magical animals will like you, and will be amenable to training.

spells.title: Potion of Growth
spells.description: The drinker grows to be 10 times larger for 20 minutes.

spells.title: Shrinking Potion
spells.description: The drinker shrinks to be 20 times smaller for 20 minutes.

spells.title: Smoke Potion
spells.description: Creates a huge cloud of black smoke when spilled.

spells.title: Vial of Acid
spells.description: Burns through objects. Deals 4 damage.

spells.title: Tree Potion
spells.description: Instantly spawns a tree where it was spilled)

spells.title: Anti-Gravity Potion
spells.description: Drinker isn't affected by gravity for an hour.

spells.title: Truth Serum
spells.description: One who drinks it can’t tell lies for an hour

spells.title: Polyjuice Potion
spells.description: Drop someone’s hair into it, and drinking this potion will turn you into that person for 30 minutes.

spells.title: Falcon Potion
spells.description: Turns you into a falcon for 30 minutes

spells.title: Potion of Body Switching
spells.description: When two people drink this potion, it swaps their minds freaky-friday style.

spells.title: Forget me now Potion
spells.description: The one who drinks this potion will completelya lose the memories of everything that happened during the past 24 hours.

spells.title: Seduction Potion
spells.description: The drinker becomes irresistable to the opposite gender.

spells.title: The Ant-Man Potion
spells.description: You shrink down to the size of an ant, while retaining the strength of a human. Lasts for 1 hour.

spells.title: Love Potion
spells.description: Drop your hair into it. The person who drinks it will fall madly in love with you for 5 hours.

spells.title: Zombie Raising Potion
spells.description: Spill on a grave to raise a zombie

spells.title: Vampire Potion
spells.description: Turns you into a vampire for a day. Your current spells and abilities are replaced with what vampire can do (see the Vampire NPC card for the list of powers). You also gain unquenchable thirs for blood (you must kill at least one sentient creature). Sunlight and garlic are deadly to you.

spells.title: Potion of Silent Death
spells.description: The one who drinks it experiences no symptoms, and then dies within one week, seemingly without a cause.
